    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Account
    Represents a player account for the 2048 game.
    Cell
    Represents a single tile (cell) in the 2048 game grid.
    Controller
     
    EndGame
    Handles the display and functionality of the end game screen.

    Main controller for the 2048 game screen.
